column4: Hello. I was wondering if it's possible to do a minimal install of Ubuntu (just the OS without the GUI) and install a custom GUI on top of it?
you can install the server version and theen choose a GUI or you can install Xubuntu for the most minimal GUI
it has some stuff that the desktop doesnt obviously so maybe minimal is better
may one enquire as to why one wishes to choose any other gui than the eminent GNOME gui that comes with the ordinary ubuntu?
